name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in developing high-performance software solutions. Proficient in modern programming languages and frameworks such as **Java**, **Spring**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Angular**, **Python**, and **Go**. Deep expertise in building scalable applications using diverse technologies, including **Kubernetes**, **Vue.js**, and **Apache Kafka**. Strong skills in operating within a **Linux** environment and leveraging **Helm** for application deployment. Proven ability to lead the development of enterprise-level platforms with an emphasis on microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and cloud-native applications. Experienced in deploying solutions on platforms like Azure and AWS, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Brings practical experience in MLOps—from developing ML pipelines to managing workflows—with tools like MLflow and Airflow. Passionate about creating robust systems that not only function technically but also deliver significant real-world value.
